identity.name: AllergyIntoleranceType
identity.description:
Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk.
http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergy-intolerance-type v3.6.0

identity.name: Code
identity.description: The code (used as the code in the resource instance). If the code is in italics, this indicates that the code is not selectable ('Abstract')

identity.name: Display
identity.description: The display (used in the display element of a Coding). If there is no display, implementers should not simply display the code, but map the concept into their application

identity.name: Definition
identity.description: An explanation of the meaning of the concept

identity.name: Translations
identity.description: Translations of records to other languages.

values: A propensity for hypersensitivity reaction(s) to a substance. These reactions are most typically type I hypersensitivity, plus other "allergy-like" reactions, including pseudo-allergy.
{"Locale":"ru","Name":"Алергия","Description":"Предрасположенность к чуствительной реакции на субстанцию. Реакция может быть чуствительной или алергической включая псевдо алергическую."}

A propensity for adverse reactions to a substance that is not judged to be allergic or "allergy-like". These reactions are typically (but not necessarily) non-immune. They are to some degree idiosyncratic and/or individually specific (i.e. are not a reaction that is expected to occur with most or all patients given similar circumstances).

{"Locale":"ru","Name":"Непереносимость","Description":"Предрасположенность к сильной реакции на субстанцию но не похожая на алергию. Обычно это не эмунная реакция. Это в какой то степени идеосинхрозия или индивидуальная реакция. "}
